item.title: Need help please will need someone who knows java very well
item.dc:creator: @jurassiced jurassiced
item.description:
@jurassiced wrote:

[code]case 5:
if (token.equals(“character-skill”)) {
playerLevel[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer
.parseInt(token3[1]);
playerXP[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = Integer
.parseInt(token3[2]);

					int level = 0;
					if (playerXP[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] > 53680911) {
						level = 151;
					} else {
						level = getLevelForXP(playerXP[Integer
								.parseInt(token3[0])]);
					}
					playerLevel[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] = level;
					setSkillLevel(Integer.parseInt(token3[0]), level,
							playerXP[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])]);
					if (Integer.parseInt(token3[0]) == 3) {
						currentHealth = level;
						maxHealth = level;
					}
				}
				break;[/code]

ok now this works im trying to bring the stats max to 151 now it will take i have the xp needed to get to it in the code BUT it wont show up right it shows up as 151/99 i have seen servers with 120/120 so i know it can be done im using Devolution source btw

Read full topic
